page.title: 20Energy_Oil
page.content:
the project as favourable.It could if successful,provide much needed jobs in the area,and also bring prosperity to the villages. {May 1985:"The well is dry" After several testholes had been sunk,the results showed that there was not enough oil to warrant production. B.P are quoted in saying that they do not expect to do anymore testing in hte forseeable future.This suggest that altough there is some oil there ,but not enough to make it economic.
{July 1985:} B.P have moved out of the area.There is now no evidence that the oil had ever been there.The landscape remains picturesque.
